channel.title: Others on Arsh Siddiqui
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Arsh Siddiqui

item.title: My Listens
item.description: My Listens # This will update every two hours as the music itself that I listen to changes. The data comes from the Spotify API, and was encorporated with Spotipy. Short Term Listens # These are the songs I have been listening to the most in the past four weeks. Medium Term Listens # These are the songs I have been listening to the most in about the past half year.

item.title: Other Websites
item.description: Other Websites # These are some of my older websites that showcase other projects of mine. They’re all effectively poorly executed jokes. Multiple Deprivation in London Showcase multiple deprivation, a measure of poverty, across the different wards of London. NYC Buildings v. Heights Basic geospatial project, showcasing New York City modeled with building heights. Humourous Marketplace Made for a hackathon, and I was tired. Limbousine Takes you to the nearest middle of nowhere from your current location.

item.title: The Best Articles I Have Read
item.description: The Best Articles I Have Read # These are some of the best articles I have read, those that have made me think or feel an emotion more strongly than I am used to. These may be news articles, but are more likely to be phrased in the form of stories. They are organized in terms of publication date. 2023 # Paul Bowles in Tangier I’m not really sure how to explain this article.

item.title: The Best Short Stories I Have Read
item.description: The Best Short Stories I Have Read # These are some of the best short stories I have read. These have made me feel things I would not normally feel reading stories and think about things more deeply than I would otherwise, or maybe they were just a fun read. They are organized in terms of publication date. 2023 # The Third Law of Magic A story about art, and the difficulty of expression.
